introduction: An isolated coastal town hides a forgotten manor and a chain of disappearances.
entry_narration: A cold rain sweeps the cliffs as you arrive at the manor gates. The iron is warm to the touch.

key_characters.name: Elena Ward
key_characters.public_info: Caretaker of the manor, calm and precise.
key_characters.hidden_secrets: She is the last of an old cult lineage and protects the sealed chamber.

key_characters.name: Deputy Harrow
key_characters.hidden_secrets: He staged evidence to keep people away from the cliffs.

core_secrets: The manor contains a prewar observatory used for forbidden rituals.
The disappearances are linked to a broken seal beneath the manor.

possible_endings.description: The players restore the seal and the town survives.
possible_endings.conditions: The broken seal is repaired and the core ritual is interrupted.

possible_endings.description: The ritual completes and the town is consumed.
possible_endings.conditions: Players fail to stop the ritual and the final rite completes.

ending_triggers: Players restore the observatory seal and disperse the ritual ash.
Players allow the ritual to complete or fail to stop the final rite.
All investigators are dead or insane.

locations.name: Hollow Sun Manor
locations.description: A crumbling cliffside estate with lights that never align with its windows.

locations.name: Seafog Cliffs
locations.description: Wind-bent grass and a shoreline that swallows footpaths after dusk.
secrets: faint sigils carved into the rock

locations.name: Town Square
locations.description: Salt-stained shops and a church bell that tolls unevenly.

scenes.title: Gates of the Manor
scenes.summary: The players confront the warm iron gate and the caretakers' first warning.
beats: a distant bell in the fog

scenes.title: The Broken Seal
scenes.summary: The hidden observatory reveals a half-finished ritual circle.

clues.description: A hand-copied diagram of the observatory rune sequence.
clues.reveal: The ritual must be restarted in reverse order.

clues.description: Deputy Harrow's altered logbook with mismatched dates.
clues.reveal: The disappearances spiked after the deputy closed the cliff path.

events.description: The church bell tolls thirteen times and stops abruptly.
A pulse of light warps the air and strains sanity.

items.name: Surveyor's Compass
items.description: Always points toward the cliff edge rather than north.

items.name: Salt-Warped Ledger
items.description: Town records with pages stuck by brine.

factions.name: Old Tide Circle
factions.goal: Keep the seal intact and the town quiet.
factions.attitude: Wary, will bargain to avoid catastrophe.

threats.name: The Hollow Sun
threats.nature: A void-like presence feeding through the broken seal.

timeline.event: Observatory sealed after a failed rite.
Seal breaks and the manor grows warm.
